00031 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LQUOTA

00033 #include "qsd_internal.h"
00034 
00039 static inline int qsd_request_enter(struct lquota_entry *lqe)
00040 {
00041         /* is there already a quota request in flight? */
00042         if (lqe->lqe_pending_req != 0) {
00043                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "already a request in flight");
00044                 return -EBUSY;
00045         }
00046 
00047         if (lqe->lqe_pending_rel != 0) {
00048                 LQUOTA_ERROR(lqe, "no request in flight with pending_rel="LPU64,
00049                              lqe->lqe_pending_rel);
00050                 LBUG();
00051         }
00052 
00053         lqe->lqe_pending_req++;
00054         return 0;
00055 }
00056 
00060 static inline void qsd_request_exit(struct lquota_entry *lqe)
00061 {
00062         if (lqe->lqe_pending_req != 1) {
00063                 LQUOTA_ERROR(lqe, "lqe_pending_req != 1!!!");
00064                 LBUG();
00065         }
00066         lqe->lqe_pending_req--;
00067         lqe->lqe_pending_rel = 0;
00068         wake_up_all(&lqe->lqe_waiters);
00069 }
00070 
00085 static int qsd_ready(struct lquota_entry *lqe, struct lustre_handle *lockh)
00086 {
00087         struct qsd_qtype_info   *qqi = lqe2qqi(lqe);
00088         struct qsd_instance     *qsd = qqi->qqi_qsd;
00089         struct obd_import       *imp = NULL;
00090         struct ldlm_lock        *lock;
00091         ENTRY;
00092 
00093         read_lock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00094         /* is the qsd about to shut down? */
00095         if (qsd->qsd_stopping) {
00096                 read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00097                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "dropping quota req since qsd is stopping");
00098                 /* Target is about to shut down, client will retry */
00099                 RETURN(-EINPROGRESS);
00100         }
00101 
00102         /* is the connection to the quota master ready? */
00103         if (qsd->qsd_exp_valid)
00104                 imp = class_exp2cliimp(qsd->qsd_exp);
00105         if (imp == NULL || imp->imp_invalid) {
00106                 read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00107                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "connection to master not ready");
00108                 RETURN(-ENOTCONN);
00109         }
00110 
00111         /* In most case, reintegration must have been triggered (when enable
00112          * quota or on OST start), however, in rare race condition (enabling
00113          * quota when starting OSTs), we might miss triggering reintegration
00114          * for some qqi.
00115          *
00116          * If the previous reintegration failed for some reason, we'll
00117          * re-trigger it here as well. */
00118         if (!qqi->qqi_glb_uptodate || !qqi->qqi_slv_uptodate) {
00119                 read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00120                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "not up-to-date, dropping request and "
00121                              "kicking off reintegration");
00122                 qsd_start_reint_thread(qqi);
00123                 RETURN(-EINPROGRESS);
00124         }
00125 
00126         /* Fill the remote global lock handle, master will check this handle
00127          * to see if the slave is sending request with stale lock */
00128         lustre_handle_copy(lockh, &qqi->qqi_lockh);
00129         read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00130 
00131         if (!lustre_handle_is_used(lockh))
00132                 RETURN(-ENOLCK);
00133 
00134         lock = ldlm_handle2lock(lockh);
00135         if (lock == NULL)
00136                 RETURN(-ENOLCK);
00137 
00138         /* return remote lock handle to be packed in quota request */
00139         lustre_handle_copy(lockh, &lock->l_remote_handle);
00140         LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lock);
00141 
00142         RETURN(0);
00143 }
00144 
00159 static bool qsd_calc_adjust(struct lquota_entry *lqe, struct quota_body *qbody)
00160 {
00161         __u64   usage, granted;
00162         ENTRY;
00163 
00164         usage   = lqe->lqe_usage;
00165         usage  += lqe->lqe_pending_write + lqe->lqe_waiting_write;
00166         granted = lqe->lqe_granted;
00167 
00168         if (qbody != NULL)
00169                 qbody->qb_flags = 0;
00170 
00171         if (!lqe->lqe_enforced) {
00172                 /* quota not enforced any more for this ID */
00173                 if (granted != 0) {
00174                         /* release all quota space unconditionally */
00175                         LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "not enforced, releasing all space");
00176                         if (qbody != NULL) {
00177                                 qbody->qb_count = granted;
00178                                 qbody->qb_flags = QUOTA_DQACQ_FL_REL;
00179                         }
00180                         RETURN(true);
00181                 }
00182                 RETURN(false);
00183         }
00184 
00185         if (!lustre_handle_is_used(&lqe->lqe_lockh)) {
00186                 /* No valid per-ID lock
00187                  * When reporting quota (during reintegration or on setquota
00188                  * glimpse), we should release granted space if usage is 0.
00189                  * Otherwise, if the usage is less than granted, we need to
00190                  * acquire the per-ID lock to make sure the unused grant can be
00191                  * reclaimed by per-ID lock glimpse. */
00192                 if (usage == 0) {
00193                         /* no on-disk usage and no outstanding activity, release
00194                          * space */
00195                         if (granted != 0) {
00196                                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "no usage, releasing all "
00197                                              "space");
00198                                 if (qbody != NULL) {
00199                                         qbody->qb_count = granted;
00200                                         qbody->qb_flags = QUOTA_DQACQ_FL_REL;
00201                                 }
00202                                 RETURN(true);
00203                         }
00204                         LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "no usage + no granted, nothing to "
00205                                      "do");
00206                         RETURN(false);
00207                 }
00208 
00209                 if (lqe->lqe_usage < lqe->lqe_granted) {
00210                         /* holding quota space w/o any lock, enqueue per-ID lock
00211                          * again */
00212                         LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "(re)acquiring per-ID lock");
00213                         if (qbody != NULL) {
00214                                 qbody->qb_count = 0;
00215                                 qbody->qb_flags = QUOTA_DQACQ_FL_ACQ;
00216                         }
00217                         RETURN(true);
00218                 }
00219 
00220                 if (lqe->lqe_usage > lqe->lqe_granted) {
00221                         /* quota overrun, report usage */
00222                         LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "overrun, reporting usage");
00223                         if (qbody != NULL) {
00224                                 qbody->qb_usage = lqe->lqe_usage;
00225                                 qbody->qb_flags = QUOTA_DQACQ_FL_REPORT;
00226                         }
00227                         RETURN(true);
00228                 }
00229                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "granted matches usage, nothing to do");
00230                 RETURN(false);
00231         }
00232 
00233         /* valid per-ID lock
00234          * Apply good old quota qunit adjustment logic which has been around
00235          * since lustre 1.4:
00236          * 1. release spare quota space? */
00237         if (granted > usage + lqe->lqe_qunit) {
00238                 /* pre-release quota space */
00239                 if (qbody == NULL)
00240                         RETURN(true);
00241                 qbody->qb_count = granted - usage;
00242                 /* if usage == 0, release all granted space */
00243                 if (usage) {
00244                         /* try to keep one qunit of quota space */
00245                         qbody->qb_count -= lqe->lqe_qunit;
00246                         /* but don't release less than qtune to avoid releasing
00247                          * space too often */
00248                         if (qbody->qb_count < lqe->lqe_qtune)
00249                                 qbody->qb_count = lqe->lqe_qtune;
00250                 }
00251                 qbody->qb_flags = QUOTA_DQACQ_FL_REL;
00252                 RETURN(true);
00253         }
00254 
00255         /* 2. Any quota overrun? */
00256         if (lqe->lqe_usage > lqe->lqe_granted) {
00257                 /* we overconsumed quota space, we report usage in request so
00258                  * that master can adjust it unconditionally */
00259                 if (qbody == NULL)
00260                         RETURN(true);
00261                 qbody->qb_usage = lqe->lqe_usage;
00262                 granted         = lqe->lqe_usage;
00263                 qbody->qb_flags = QUOTA_DQACQ_FL_REPORT;
00264         }
00265 
00266         /* 3. Time to pre-acquire? */
00267         if (!lqe->lqe_edquot && !lqe->lqe_nopreacq && usage > 0 &&
00268             lqe->lqe_qunit != 0 && granted < usage + lqe->lqe_qtune) {
00269                 /* To pre-acquire quota space, we report how much spare quota
00270                  * space the slave currently owns, then the master will grant us
00271                  * back how much we can pretend given the current state of
00272                  * affairs */
00273                 if (qbody == NULL)
00274                         RETURN(true);
00275                 if (granted <= usage)
00276                         qbody->qb_count = 0;
00277                 else
00278                         qbody->qb_count = granted - usage;
00279                 qbody->qb_flags |= QUOTA_DQACQ_FL_PREACQ;
00280                 RETURN(true);
00281         }
00282 
00283         if (qbody != NULL)
00284                 RETURN(qbody->qb_flags != 0);
00285         else
00286                 RETURN(false);
00287 }
00288 
00293 static inline bool qsd_adjust_needed(struct lquota_entry *lqe)
00294 {
00295         return qsd_calc_adjust(lqe, NULL);
00296 }
00297 
00302 static void qsd_req_completion(const struct lu_env *env,
00303                                struct qsd_qtype_info *qqi,
00304                                struct quota_body *reqbody,
00305                                struct quota_body *repbody,
00306                                struct lustre_handle *lockh,
00307                                struct lquota_lvb *lvb,
00308                                void *arg, int ret)
00309 {
00310         struct lquota_entry     *lqe = (struct lquota_entry *)arg;
00311         struct qsd_thread_info  *qti;
00312         int                      rc;
00313         bool                     adjust = false, cancel = false;
00314         ENTRY;
00315 
00316         LASSERT(qqi != NULL && lqe != NULL);
00317 
00318         /* environment passed by ptlrpcd is mostly used by CLIO and hasn't the
00319          * DT tags set. */
00320         rc = lu_env_refill_by_tags((struct lu_env *)env, LCT_DT_THREAD, 0);
00321         if (rc) {
00322                 LQUOTA_ERROR(lqe, "failed to refill environmnent %d", rc);
00323                 lqe_write_lock(lqe);
00324                 /* can't afford to adjust quota space with no suitable lu_env */
00325                 GOTO(out_noadjust, rc);
00326         }
00327         qti = qsd_info(env);
00328 
00329         lqe_write_lock(lqe);
00330         LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "DQACQ returned %d, flags:0x%x", ret,
00331                      reqbody->qb_flags);
00332 
00333         /* despite -EDQUOT & -EINPROGRESS errors, the master might still
00334          * grant us back quota space to adjust quota overrun */
00335         if (ret != 0 && ret != -EDQUOT && ret != -EINPROGRESS) {
00336                 if (ret != -ETIMEDOUT && ret != -ENOTCONN &&
00337                    ret != -ESHUTDOWN && ret != -EAGAIN)
00338                         /* print errors only if return code is unexpected */
00339                         LQUOTA_ERROR(lqe, "DQACQ failed with %d, flags:0x%x",
00340                                      ret, reqbody->qb_flags);
00341                 GOTO(out, ret);
00342         }
00343 
00344         /* Set the lqe_lockh */
00345         if (lustre_handle_is_used(lockh) &&
00346             !lustre_handle_equal(lockh, &lqe->lqe_lockh))
00347                 lustre_handle_copy(&lqe->lqe_lockh, lockh);
00348 
00349         /* If the replied qb_count is zero, it means master didn't process
00350          * the DQACQ since the limit for this ID has been removed, so we
00351          * should not update quota entry & slave index copy neither. */
00352         if (repbody != NULL && repbody->qb_count != 0) {
00353                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "DQACQ qb_count:"LPU64, repbody->qb_count);
00354 
00355                 if (req_is_rel(reqbody->qb_flags)) {
00356                         if (lqe->lqe_granted < repbody->qb_count) {
00357                                 LQUOTA_ERROR(lqe, "can't release more space "
00358                                              "than owned "LPU64"<"LPU64,
00359                                              lqe->lqe_granted,
00360                                              repbody->qb_count);
00361                                 lqe->lqe_granted = 0;
00362                         } else {
00363                                 lqe->lqe_granted -= repbody->qb_count;
00364                         }
00365                         /* Cancel the per-ID lock initiatively when there
00366                          * isn't any usage & grant, which can avoid master
00367                          * sending glimpse unnecessarily to this slave on
00368                          * quota revoking */
00369                         if (!lqe->lqe_pending_write && !lqe->lqe_granted &&
00370                             !lqe->lqe_waiting_write && !lqe->lqe_usage)
00371                                 cancel = true;
00372                 } else {
00373                         lqe->lqe_granted += repbody->qb_count;
00374                 }
00375                 qti->qti_rec.lqr_slv_rec.qsr_granted = lqe->lqe_granted;
00376                 lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00377 
00378                 /* Update the slave index file in the dedicated thread. So far,
00379                  * We don't update the version of slave index copy on DQACQ.
00380                  * No locking is necessary since nobody can change
00381                  * lqe->lqe_granted while lqe->lqe_pending_req > 0 */
00382                 qsd_upd_schedule(qqi, lqe, &lqe->lqe_id, &qti->qti_rec, 0,
00383                                  false);
00384                 lqe_write_lock(lqe);
00385         }
00386 
00387         /* extract information from lvb */
00388         if (ret == 0 && lvb != NULL) {
00389                 if (lvb->lvb_id_qunit != 0)
00390                         qsd_set_qunit(lqe, lvb->lvb_id_qunit);
00391                 qsd_set_edquot(lqe, !!(lvb->lvb_flags & LQUOTA_FL_EDQUOT));
00392         } else if (repbody != NULL && repbody->qb_qunit != 0) {
00393                 qsd_set_qunit(lqe, repbody->qb_qunit);
00394         }
00395 
00396         /* turn off pre-acquire if it failed with -EDQUOT. This is done to avoid
00397          * flooding the master with acquire request. Pre-acquire will be turned
00398          * on again as soon as qunit is modified */
00399         if (req_is_preacq(reqbody->qb_flags) && ret == -EDQUOT)
00400                 lqe->lqe_nopreacq = true;
00401 out:
00402         adjust = qsd_adjust_needed(lqe);
00403         if (reqbody && req_is_acq(reqbody->qb_flags) && ret != -EDQUOT) {
00404                 lqe->lqe_acq_rc = ret;
00405                 lqe->lqe_acq_time = cfs_time_current_64();
00406         }
00407 out_noadjust:
00408         qsd_request_exit(lqe);
00409         lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00410 
00411         /* release reference on per-ID lock */
00412         if (lustre_handle_is_used(lockh))
00413                 ldlm_lock_decref(lockh, qsd_id_einfo.ei_mode);
00414 
00415         if (cancel) {
00416                 qsd_adjust_schedule(lqe, false, true);
00417         } else if (adjust) {
00418                 if (!ret || ret == -EDQUOT)
00419                         qsd_adjust_schedule(lqe, false, false);
00420                 else
00421                         qsd_adjust_schedule(lqe, true, false);
00422         }
00423         lqe_putref(lqe);
00424 
00425         if (lvb)
00426                 OBD_FREE_PTR(lvb);
00427         EXIT;
00428 }
00429 
00440 static int qsd_acquire_local(struct lquota_entry *lqe, __u64 space)
00441 {
00442         __u64   usage;
00443         int     rc;
00444         ENTRY;
00445 
00446         if (!lqe->lqe_enforced)
00447                 /* not enforced any more, we are good */
00448                 RETURN(-ESRCH);
00449 
00450         lqe_write_lock(lqe);
00451         /* use latest usage */
00452         usage = lqe->lqe_usage;
00453         /* take pending write into account */
00454         usage += lqe->lqe_pending_write;
00455 
00456         if (space + usage <= lqe->lqe_granted - lqe->lqe_pending_rel) {
00457                 /* Yay! we got enough space */
00458                 lqe->lqe_pending_write += space;
00459                 lqe->lqe_waiting_write -= space;
00460                 rc = 0;
00461         /* lqe_edquot flag is used to avoid flooding dqacq requests when
00462          * the user is over quota, however, the lqe_edquot could be stale
00463          * sometimes due to the race reply of dqacq vs. id lock glimpse
00464          * (see LU-4505), so we revalidate it every 5 seconds. */
00465         } else if (lqe->lqe_edquot &&
00466                    cfs_time_before_64(cfs_time_shift_64(-5),
00467                                       lqe->lqe_edquot_time)) {
00468                 rc = -EDQUOT;
00469         }else {
00470                 rc = -EAGAIN;
00471         }
00472         lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00473 
00474         RETURN(rc);
00475 }
00476 
00489 static inline bool qsd_calc_acquire(struct lquota_entry *lqe,
00490                                     struct quota_body *qbody)
00491 {
00492         __u64   usage, granted;
00493 
00494         usage   = lqe->lqe_usage;
00495         usage  += lqe->lqe_pending_write + lqe->lqe_waiting_write;
00496         granted = lqe->lqe_granted;
00497 
00498         qbody->qb_flags = 0;
00499 
00500         /* if we overconsumed quota space, we report usage in request so that
00501          * master can adjust it unconditionally */
00502         if (lqe->lqe_usage > lqe->lqe_granted) {
00503                 qbody->qb_usage = lqe->lqe_usage;
00504                 qbody->qb_flags = QUOTA_DQACQ_FL_REPORT;
00505                 granted = lqe->lqe_usage;
00506         }
00507 
00508         /* acquire as much as needed, but not more */
00509         if (usage > granted) {
00510                 qbody->qb_count  = usage - granted;
00511                 qbody->qb_flags |= QUOTA_DQACQ_FL_ACQ;
00512         }
00513 
00514         return qbody->qb_flags != 0;
00515 }
00516 
00530 static int qsd_acquire_remote(const struct lu_env *env,
00531                               struct lquota_entry *lqe)
00532 {
00533         struct qsd_thread_info  *qti = qsd_info(env);
00534         struct quota_body       *qbody = &qti->qti_body;
00535         struct qsd_instance     *qsd;
00536         struct qsd_qtype_info   *qqi;
00537         int                      rc;
00538         ENTRY;
00539 
00540         memset(qbody, 0, sizeof(*qbody));
00541         rc = qsd_ready(lqe, &qbody->qb_glb_lockh);
00542         if (rc)
00543                 RETURN(rc);
00544 
00545         qqi = lqe2qqi(lqe);
00546         qsd = qqi->qqi_qsd;
00547 
00548         lqe_write_lock(lqe);
00549 
00550         /* is quota really enforced for this id? */
00551         if (!lqe->lqe_enforced) {
00552                 lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00553                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "quota not enforced any more");
00554                 RETURN(0);
00555         }
00556 
00557         /* fill qb_count & qb_flags */
00558         if (!qsd_calc_acquire(lqe, qbody)) {
00559                 lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00560                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "No acquire required");
00561                 RETURN(0);
00562         }
00563 
00564         /* check whether an acquire request completed recently */
00565         if (lqe->lqe_acq_rc != 0 &&
00566             cfs_time_before_64(cfs_time_shift_64(-1), lqe->lqe_acq_time)) {
00567                 lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00568                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "using cached return code %d", lqe->lqe_acq_rc);
00569                 RETURN(lqe->lqe_acq_rc);
00570         }
00571 
00572         /* only 1 quota request in flight for a given ID is allowed */
00573         rc = qsd_request_enter(lqe);
00574         if (rc) {
00575                 lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00576                 RETURN(rc);
00577         }
00578 
00579         lustre_handle_copy(&qti->qti_lockh, &lqe->lqe_lockh);
00580         lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00581 
00582         /* hold a refcount until completion */
00583         lqe_getref(lqe);
00584 
00585         /* fill other quota body fields */
00586         qbody->qb_fid = qqi->qqi_fid;
00587         qbody->qb_id  = lqe->lqe_id;
00588 
00589         /* check whether we already own a valid lock for this ID */
00590         rc = qsd_id_lock_match(&qti->qti_lockh, &qbody->qb_lockh);
00591         if (rc) {
00592                 struct lquota_lvb *lvb;
00593 
00594                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(lvb);
00595                 if (lvb == NULL) {
00596                         rc = -ENOMEM;
00597                         qsd_req_completion(env, qqi, qbody, NULL,
00598                                            &qti->qti_lockh, NULL, lqe, rc);
00599                         RETURN(rc);
00600                 }
00601                 /* no lock found, should use intent */
00602                 rc = qsd_intent_lock(env, qsd->qsd_exp, qbody, true,
00603                                      IT_QUOTA_DQACQ, qsd_req_completion,
00604                                      qqi, lvb, (void *)lqe);
00605         } else {
00606                 /* lock found, should use regular dqacq */
00607                 rc = qsd_send_dqacq(env, qsd->qsd_exp, qbody, true,
00608                                     qsd_req_completion, qqi, &qti->qti_lockh,
00609                                     lqe);
00610         }
00611 
00612         /* the completion function will be called by qsd_send_dqacq or
00613          * qsd_intent_lock */
00614         RETURN(rc);
00615 }
00616 
00630 static bool qsd_acquire(const struct lu_env *env, struct lquota_entry *lqe,
00631                         long long space, int *ret)
00632 {
00633         int rc = 0, count;
00634         ENTRY;
00635 
00636         for (count = 0; rc == 0; count++) {
00637                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "acquiring:"LPD64 " count=%d", space, count);
00638 
00639                 if (lqe2qqi(lqe)->qqi_qsd->qsd_stopping) {
00640                         rc = -EINPROGRESS;
00641                         break;
00642                 }
00643 
00644                 /* refresh disk usage */
00645                 rc = qsd_refresh_usage(env, lqe);
00646                 if (rc)
00647                         break;
00648 
00649                 /* try to consume local quota space first */
00650                 rc = qsd_acquire_local(lqe, space);
00651                 if (rc != -EAGAIN)
00652                         /* rc == 0, Wouhou! enough local quota space
00653                          * rc < 0, something bad happened */
00654                          break;
00655 
00656                 /* need to acquire more quota space from master */
00657                 rc = qsd_acquire_remote(env, lqe);
00658         }
00659 
00660         if (rc == -EBUSY)
00661                 /* already a request in flight, continue waiting */
00662                 RETURN(false);
00663         *ret = rc;
00664         RETURN(true); /* exit from l_wait_event */
00665 }
00666 
00686 static int qsd_op_begin0(const struct lu_env *env, struct qsd_qtype_info *qqi,
00687                          struct lquota_id_info *qid, long long space,
00688                          int *flags)
00689 {
00690         struct lquota_entry     *lqe;
00691         int                      rc, ret = -EINPROGRESS;
00692         struct l_wait_info       lwi;
00693         ENTRY;
00694 
00695         if (qid->lqi_qentry != NULL) {
00696                 /* we already had to deal with this id for this transaction */
00697                 lqe = qid->lqi_qentry;
00698                 if (!lqe->lqe_enforced)
00699                         RETURN(0);
00700         } else {
00701                 /* look up lquota entry associated with qid */
00702                 lqe = lqe_locate(env, qqi->qqi_site, &qid->lqi_id);
00703                 if (IS_ERR(lqe))
00704                         RETURN(PTR_ERR(lqe));
00705                 if (!lqe->lqe_enforced) {
00706                         lqe_putref(lqe);
00707                         RETURN(0);
00708                 }
00709                 qid->lqi_qentry = lqe;
00710                 /* lqe will be released in qsd_op_end() */
00711         }
00712 
00713         if (space <= 0) {
00714                 /* when space is negative or null, we don't need to consume
00715                  * quota space. That said, we still want to perform space
00716                  * adjustments in qsd_op_end, so we return here, but with
00717                  * a reference on the lqe */
00718                 if (flags != NULL) {
00719                         rc = qsd_refresh_usage(env, lqe);
00720                         GOTO(out_flags, rc);
00721                 }
00722                 RETURN(0);
00723         }
00724 
00725         LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "op_begin space:"LPD64, space);
00726 
00727         lqe_write_lock(lqe);
00728         lqe->lqe_waiting_write += space;
00729         lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00730 
00731         /* acquire quota space for the operation, cap overall wait time to
00732          * prevent a service thread from being stuck for too long */
00733         lwi = LWI_TIMEOUT(cfs_time_seconds(qsd_wait_timeout(qqi->qqi_qsd)),
00734                           NULL, NULL);
00735         rc = l_wait_event(lqe->lqe_waiters, qsd_acquire(env, lqe, space, &ret),
00736                           &lwi);
00737 
00738         if (rc == 0 && ret == 0) {
00739                 qid->lqi_space += space;
00740         } else {
00741                 if (rc == 0)
00742                         rc = ret;
00743 
00744                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "acquire quota failed:%d", rc);
00745 
00746                 lqe_write_lock(lqe);
00747                 lqe->lqe_waiting_write -= space;
00748 
00749                 if (flags && lqe->lqe_pending_write != 0)
00750                         /* Inform OSD layer that there are pending writes.
00751                          * It might want to retry after a sync if appropriate */
00752                          *flags |= QUOTA_FL_SYNC;
00753                 lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00754 
00755                 /* convert recoverable error into -EINPROGRESS, client will
00756                  * retry */
00757                 if (rc == -ETIMEDOUT || rc == -ENOTCONN || rc == -ENOLCK ||
00758                     rc == -EAGAIN || rc == -EINTR) {
00759                         rc = -EINPROGRESS;
00760                 } else if (rc == -ESRCH) {
00761                         rc = 0;
00762                         LQUOTA_ERROR(lqe, "ID isn't enforced on master, it "
00763                                      "probably due to a legeal race, if this "
00764                                      "message is showing up constantly, there "
00765                                      "could be some inconsistence between "
00766                                      "master & slave, and quota reintegration "
00767                                      "needs be re-triggered.");
00768                 }
00769         }
00770 
00771         if (flags != NULL) {
00772 out_flags:
00773                 LASSERT(qid->lqi_is_blk);
00774                 if (rc != 0) {
00775                         *flags |= LQUOTA_OVER_FL(qqi->qqi_qtype);
00776                 } else {
00777                         __u64   usage;
00778 
00779                         lqe_read_lock(lqe);
00780                         usage  = lqe->lqe_usage;
00781                         usage += lqe->lqe_pending_write;
00782                         usage += lqe->lqe_waiting_write;
00783                         usage += qqi->qqi_qsd->qsd_sync_threshold;
00784 
00785                         /* if we should notify client to start sync write */
00786                         if (usage >= lqe->lqe_granted - lqe->lqe_pending_rel)
00787                                 *flags |= LQUOTA_OVER_FL(qqi->qqi_qtype);
00788                         else
00789                                 *flags &= ~LQUOTA_OVER_FL(qqi->qqi_qtype);
00790                         lqe_read_unlock(lqe);
00791                 }
00792         }
00793         RETURN(rc);
00794 }
00795 
00799 static inline bool qid_equal(struct lquota_id_info *q1,
00800                              struct lquota_id_info *q2)
00801 {
00802         if (q1->lqi_type != q2->lqi_type)
00803                 return false;
00804         return (q1->lqi_id.qid_uid == q2->lqi_id.qid_uid) ? true : false;
00805 }
00806 
00825 int qsd_op_begin(const struct lu_env *env, struct qsd_instance *qsd,
00826                  struct lquota_trans *trans, struct lquota_id_info *qi,
00827                  int *flags)
00828 {
00829         int     i, rc;
00830         bool    found = false;
00831         ENTRY;
00832 
00833         if (unlikely(qsd == NULL))
00834                 RETURN(0);
00835 
00836         /* We don't enforce quota until the qsd_instance is started */
00837         read_lock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00838         if (!qsd->qsd_started) {
00839                 read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00840                 RETURN(0);
00841         }
00842         read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
00843 
00844         /* ignore block quota on MDTs, ignore inode quota on OSTs */
00845         if ((!qsd->qsd_is_md && !qi->lqi_is_blk) ||
00846             (qsd->qsd_is_md && qi->lqi_is_blk))
00847                 RETURN(0);
00848 
00849         /* ignore quota enforcement request when:
00850          *    - quota isn't enforced for this quota type
00851          * or - the user/group is root
00852          * or - quota accounting isn't enabled */
00853         if (!qsd_type_enabled(qsd, qi->lqi_type) || qi->lqi_id.qid_uid == 0 ||
00854             qsd->qsd_acct_failed)
00855                 RETURN(0);
00856 
00857         LASSERTF(trans->lqt_id_cnt <= QUOTA_MAX_TRANSIDS, "id_cnt=%d\n",
00858                  trans->lqt_id_cnt);
00859         /* check whether we already allocated a slot for this id */
00860         for (i = 0; i < trans->lqt_id_cnt; i++) {
00861                 if (qid_equal(qi, &trans->lqt_ids[i])) {
00862                         found = true;
00863                         /* make sure we are not mixing inodes & blocks */
00864                         LASSERT(trans->lqt_ids[i].lqi_is_blk == qi->lqi_is_blk);
00865                         break;
00866                 }
00867         }
00868 
00869         if (!found) {
00870                 if (unlikely(i >= QUOTA_MAX_TRANSIDS)) {
00871                         CERROR("%s: more than %d qids enforced for a "
00872                                "transaction?\n", qsd->qsd_svname, i);
00873                         RETURN(-EINVAL);
00874                 }
00875 
00876                 /* fill new slot */
00877                 trans->lqt_ids[i].lqi_id     = qi->lqi_id;
00878                 trans->lqt_ids[i].lqi_type   = qi->lqi_type;
00879                 trans->lqt_ids[i].lqi_is_blk = qi->lqi_is_blk;
00880                 trans->lqt_id_cnt++;
00881         }
00882 
00883         /* manage quota enforcement for this ID */
00884         rc = qsd_op_begin0(env, qsd->qsd_type_array[qi->lqi_type],
00885                            &trans->lqt_ids[i], qi->lqi_space, flags);
00886         RETURN(rc);
00887 }
00888 EXPORT_SYMBOL(qsd_op_begin);
00889 
00902 int qsd_adjust(const struct lu_env *env, struct lquota_entry *lqe)
00903 {
00904         struct qsd_thread_info  *qti = qsd_info(env);
00905         struct quota_body       *qbody = &qti->qti_body;
00906         struct qsd_instance     *qsd;
00907         struct qsd_qtype_info   *qqi;
00908         int                      rc;
00909         bool                     intent = false;
00910         ENTRY;
00911 
00912         memset(qbody, 0, sizeof(*qbody));
00913         rc = qsd_ready(lqe, &qbody->qb_glb_lockh);
00914         if (rc) {
00915                 /* add to adjust list again to trigger adjustment later when
00916                  * slave is ready */
00917                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "delaying adjustment since qsd isn't ready");
00918                 qsd_adjust_schedule(lqe, true, false);
00919                 RETURN(0);
00920         }
00921 
00922         qqi = lqe2qqi(lqe);
00923         qsd = qqi->qqi_qsd;
00924 
00925         lqe_write_lock(lqe);
00926 
00927         /* fill qb_count & qb_flags */
00928         if (!qsd_calc_adjust(lqe, qbody)) {
00929                 lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00930                 LQUOTA_DEBUG(lqe, "no adjustment required");
00931                 RETURN(0);
00932         }
00933 
00934         /* only 1 quota request in flight for a given ID is allowed */
00935         rc = qsd_request_enter(lqe);
00936         if (rc) {
00937                 /* already a request in flight, space adjustment will be run
00938                  * again on request completion */
00939                 lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00940                 RETURN(0);
00941         }
00942 
00943         if (req_is_rel(qbody->qb_flags))
00944                 lqe->lqe_pending_rel = qbody->qb_count;
00945         lustre_handle_copy(&qti->qti_lockh, &lqe->lqe_lockh);
00946         lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
00947 
00948         /* hold a refcount until completion */
00949         lqe_getref(lqe);
00950 
00951         /* fill other quota body fields */
00952         qbody->qb_fid = qqi->qqi_fid;
00953         qbody->qb_id  = lqe->lqe_id;
00954 
00955         if (req_is_acq(qbody->qb_flags) || req_is_preacq(qbody->qb_flags)) {
00956                 /* check whether we own a valid lock for this ID */
00957                 rc = qsd_id_lock_match(&qti->qti_lockh, &qbody->qb_lockh);
00958                 if (rc) {
00959                         memset(&qti->qti_lockh, 0, sizeof(qti->qti_lockh));
00960                         if (req_is_preacq(qbody->qb_flags)) {
00961                                 if (req_has_rep(qbody->qb_flags))
00962                                         /* still want to report usage */
00963                                         qbody->qb_flags = QUOTA_DQACQ_FL_REPORT;
00964                                 else
00965                                         /* no pre-acquire if no per-ID lock */
00966                                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOLCK);
00967                         } else {
00968                                 /* no lock found, should use intent */
00969                                 intent = true;
00970                         }
00971                 } else if (req_is_acq(qbody->qb_flags) &&
00972                            qbody->qb_count == 0) {
00973                         /* found cached lock, no need to acquire */
00974                         GOTO(out, rc = 0);
00975                 }
00976         } else {
00977                 /* release and report don't need a per-ID lock */
00978                 memset(&qti->qti_lockh, 0, sizeof(qti->qti_lockh));
00979         }
00980 
00981         if (!intent) {
00982                 rc = qsd_send_dqacq(env, qsd->qsd_exp, qbody, false,
00983                                     qsd_req_completion, qqi, &qti->qti_lockh,
00984                                     lqe);
00985         } else {
00986                 struct lquota_lvb *lvb;
00987 
00988                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(lvb);
00989                 if (lvb == NULL)
00990                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00991 
00992                 rc = qsd_intent_lock(env, qsd->qsd_exp, qbody, false,
00993                                      IT_QUOTA_DQACQ, qsd_req_completion,
00994                                      qqi, lvb, (void *)lqe);
00995         }
00996         /* the completion function will be called by qsd_send_dqacq or
00997          * qsd_intent_lock */
00998         RETURN(rc);
00999 out:
01000         qsd_req_completion(env, qqi, qbody, NULL, &qti->qti_lockh, NULL, lqe,
01001                            rc);
01002         return rc;
01003 }
01004 
01019 static void qsd_op_end0(const struct lu_env *env, struct qsd_qtype_info *qqi,
01020                         struct lquota_id_info *qid)
01021 {
01022         struct lquota_entry     *lqe;
01023         bool                     adjust;
01024         ENTRY;
01025 
01026         lqe = qid->lqi_qentry;
01027         if (lqe == NULL)
01028                 RETURN_EXIT;
01029         qid->lqi_qentry = NULL;
01030 
01031         /* refresh cached usage if a suitable environment is passed */
01032         if (env != NULL)
01033                 qsd_refresh_usage(env, lqe);
01034 
01035         lqe_write_lock(lqe);
01036         if (qid->lqi_space > 0)
01037                 lqe->lqe_pending_write -= qid->lqi_space;
01038         if (env != NULL)
01039                 adjust = qsd_adjust_needed(lqe);
01040         else
01041                 adjust = true;
01042         lqe_write_unlock(lqe);
01043 
01044         if (adjust) {
01045                 /* pre-acquire/release quota space is needed */
01046                 if (env != NULL)
01047                         qsd_adjust(env, lqe);
01048                 else
01049                         /* no suitable environment, handle adjustment in
01050                          * separate thread context */
01051                         qsd_adjust_schedule(lqe, false, false);
01052         }
01053         lqe_putref(lqe);
01054         EXIT;
01055 }
01056 
01069 void qsd_op_end(const struct lu_env *env, struct qsd_instance *qsd,
01070                 struct lquota_trans *trans)
01071 {
01072         int i;
01073         ENTRY;
01074 
01075         if (unlikely(qsd == NULL))
01076                 RETURN_EXIT;
01077 
01078         /* We don't enforce quota until the qsd_instance is started */
01079         read_lock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
01080         if (!qsd->qsd_started) {
01081                 read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
01082                 RETURN_EXIT;
01083         }
01084         read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
01085 
01086         LASSERT(trans != NULL);
01087 
01088         for (i = 0; i < trans->lqt_id_cnt; i++) {
01089                 struct qsd_qtype_info *qqi;
01090 
01091                 if (trans->lqt_ids[i].lqi_qentry == NULL)
01092                         continue;
01093 
01094                 qqi = qsd->qsd_type_array[trans->lqt_ids[i].lqi_type];
01095                 qsd_op_end0(env, qqi, &trans->lqt_ids[i]);
01096         }
01097 
01098         /* reset id_count to 0 so that a second accidental call to qsd_op_end()
01099          * does not result in failure */
01100         trans->lqt_id_cnt = 0;
01101         EXIT;
01102 }
01103 EXPORT_SYMBOL(qsd_op_end);
01104 
01119 void qsd_op_adjust(const struct lu_env *env, struct qsd_instance *qsd,
01120                    union lquota_id *qid, int qtype)
01121 {
01122         struct lquota_entry    *lqe;
01123         struct qsd_qtype_info  *qqi;
01124         bool                    adjust;
01125         ENTRY;
01126 
01127         if (unlikely(qsd == NULL))
01128                 RETURN_EXIT;
01129 
01130         /* We don't enforce quota until the qsd_instance is started */
01131         read_lock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
01132         if (!qsd->qsd_started) {
01133                 read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
01134                 RETURN_EXIT;
01135         }
01136         read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
01137 
01138         qqi = qsd->qsd_type_array[qtype];
01139         LASSERT(qqi);
01140 
01141         if (!qsd_type_enabled(qsd, qtype) || qqi->qqi_acct_obj == NULL ||
01142             qid->qid_uid == 0)
01143                 RETURN_EXIT;
01144 
01145         read_lock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
01146         if (!qsd->qsd_started) {
01147                 read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
01148                 RETURN_EXIT;
01149         }
01150         read_unlock(&qsd->qsd_lock);
01151 
01152         lqe = lqe_locate(env, qqi->qqi_site, qid);
01153         if (IS_ERR(lqe)) {
01154                 CERROR("%s: fail to locate lqe for id:"LPU64", type:%d\n",
01155                        qsd->qsd_svname, qid->qid_uid, qtype);
01156                 RETURN_EXIT;
01157         }
01158 
01159         qsd_refresh_usage(env, lqe);
01160 
01161         lqe_read_lock(lqe);
01162         adjust = qsd_adjust_needed(lqe);
01163         lqe_read_unlock(lqe);
01164 
01165         if (adjust)
01166                 qsd_adjust(env, lqe);
01167 
01168         lqe_putref(lqe);
01169         EXIT;
01170 }
01171 EXPORT_SYMBOL(qsd_op_adjust);
